QueryDataSource.Name: dtDataSource
QueryDataSource.Sql:
select decode(grouping_id(科室),0,科室,'合计:') 类型, nvl(sum(中山三院),0) 中山三院, nvl(sum(外院),0) 外院, nvl(sum(企业会员),0) 企业会员, nvl(sum(商业保险),0) 商业保险, nvl(sum(异业联盟),0) 异业联盟, nvl(sum(企业),0) 企业, nvl(sum(渠道转诊其他),0) 渠道转诊其他, nvl(sum(个人),0) 个人, nvl(sum(口碑),0) 口碑, nvl(sum(活动),0) 活动, nvl(sum(户外),0) 户外, nvl(sum(其他广告),0) 其他广告, nvl(sum(纸媒),0) 纸媒, nvl(sum(官网),0) 官网, nvl(sum(官微),0) 官微, nvl(sum(挂号网),0) 挂号网, nvl(sum(社群),0) 社群, nvl(sum(商城),0) 商城, nvl(sum(其它网络),0) 其它网络, nvl(sum(老带新),0) 老带新, nvl(sum(员工推介),0) 员工推介, nvl(sum(本院员工),0) 本院员工, nvl(sum(代理人),0) 代理人, nvl(sum(公海渠道),0) 公海渠道, nvl(sum(其他),0)+nvl(sum(其它),0)+nvl(sum(其),0) 其他， nvl(sum(合计),0) 合计 from ( select * from ( select nvl(sum(AMOUNT),0) 人次, channel1||'-'||channel2 来源, firstname 科室 from ( select HOSPITALNAME, PATIENTNAME, PHONE, FIRSTNAME, wm_concat(distinct SECONDNAME) SECONDNAME, wm_concat(distinct PACKAGENAME) PACKAGENAME, sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT, sum(CASHCOST) CASHCOST, OPER_DATE, CHANNEL1, CHANNEL2 from ( select hospitalname, name patientname, phone phone, firstname, wm_concat(distinct secondname) secondname, wm_concat(distinct packagename) packagename, case when oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount3>0 then 1 when oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount3<0 then -1 else 0 end amount, round(sum(case when invoice_real = 0 then 0 else round(cashCost*real_cost/invoice_real,4) end),2) cashCost, oper_date oper_date, channel1, channel2 from ( --妇科、生活美容、LPG、中医科、其他 select case when t4.code in ('11','14','5','19') then '妇科' else replace(t4.name,'套餐','') end firstname, t3.package_name packagename, t.invoice_no invoice_no, t.real_cost invoice_real, t2.real_cost, cp.name, to_char(t2.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date, nvl((select sum(a.real_cost) from exp_packagepaymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and (a.mode_code in ( 'CA','UP','ZB','WP','PO','CD')) ),0) cashCost， case when t3.package_name like '%自选包%' then 0 when t3.package_name not like '%自选包%' and t2.trans_type=1 then 1 when t3.package_name not like '%自选包%' and t2.trans_type=2 then -1 end amount ,t7.package_name secondname ,case when (cp.home_tel like '%-%' or cp.home_tel is null) then cp.linkman_tel else cp.home_tel end phone , case when t3.package_name like '%自选包%' then '自选包' else '套餐' end type ,cp.channel1 ,cp.channel2 ,case when t.print_invoiceno like 'IB%' then '广州爱博恩妇产医院' else '爱博恩医疗门诊部' end hospitalname ,t2.card_no from exp_packageinvoice t left join exp_package t2 on t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and t.trans_type=t2.trans_type left join bd_com_package t3 on t2.package_id = t3.package_id left join bd_com_package t7 on t3.parent_code=t7.package_id left join com_patientinfo cp on t2.card_no=cp.card_no left join (select * from com_dictionary where type = 'PACKAGETYPE') t4 on t3.package_kind = t4.code where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and t4.code!='21' and t4.code in ('12','14','11','17','13', '19','5','20'，'16') and t.trans_type = t2.trans_type union all---医美 select case when t4.code='15' then '居家月子' else replace(t4.name,'套餐','') end firstname, t3.package_name packagename, t.invoice_no invoice_no, t.real_cost invoice_real, t2.real_cost, cp.name, to_char(t2.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date, nvl((select sum(a.real_cost) from exp_packagepaymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and (a.mode_code in ( 'CA','UP','ZB','WP','PO','CD')) ),0) cashCost ,decode(t2.trans_type,1,1,2,-1) amount ,t7.package_name secondname ,case when cp.home_tel like '%-%' or cp.home_tel is null then cp.linkman_tel else cp.home_tel end phone ,case when t3.package_name like '%自选包%' then '自选包' else '套餐' end type ,cp.channel1 ,cp.channel2 ,case when t.print_invoiceno like 'IB%' then '广州爱博恩妇产医院' else '爱博恩医疗门诊部' end hospitalname ,t2.card_no from exp_packageinvoice t left join exp_package t2 on t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and t.trans_type=t2.trans_type left join bd_com_package t3 on t2.package_id = t3.package_id left join bd_com_package t7 on t3.parent_code=t7.package_id left join com_patientinfo cp on t2.card_no=cp.card_no left join (select * from com_dictionary where type = 'PACKAGETYPE') t4 on t3.package_kind = t4.code where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and t4.code!='21' and t4.code in ('25'，'6','15') and t.trans_type = t2.trans_type )tt left join ( select ep.card_no,min(ep.oper_date) oper_date3,sum(decode(ep.trans_type,1,1,2,-1)) amount3,type from ( select distinct ep.card_no,to_char(ep.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date,ep.trans_type,ep.invoice_no ,case when cd.code in ('11','14','5','19') then '妇科' when cd.code in ('25','6') then '医美' else replace(cd.name,'套餐','') end type from exp_package ep left join bd_com_package bp on ep.package_id=bp.package_id left join com_dictionary cd on bp.package_kind=cd.code and cd.type='PACKAGETYPE' where ep.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and cd.code in ('25','6','12','14','11','17','13', '19','5','20'，'16','15') and ep.pay_flag=1 )ep group by ep.card_no,type ) ep3 on tt.card_no=ep3.card_no and ep3.type=tt.firstname group by hospitalname,name,phone,firstname,oper_date, channel1,channel2 ,case when oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount3>0 then 1 when oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount3<0 then -1 else 0 end union all select hospitalname, name patientname, phone phone, firstname, wm_concat(distinct secondname) secondname, wm_concat(distinct packagename) packagename, case when firstname not like '%加收%' and oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount>0 then 1 when firstname not like '%加收%' and oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount<0 then -1 else 0 end amount, round(sum(case when (invoice_real = 0 or i is not null) then 0 else round(cashCost*real_cost/invoice_real,4) end),2) cashCost, oper_date, channel1, channel2 from ( select --replace(t4.name,'套餐','') firstname, --分娩、月子 t3.package_name packagename, t.invoice_no invoice_no, t.real_cost invoice_real, t2.real_cost, cp.name, to_char(t2.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date, nvl((select sum(a.real_cost) from exp_packagepaymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and (a.mode_code in ( 'CA','UP','ZB','WP','PO','CD')) ),0) cashCost ,decode(t2.trans_type,1,1,2,-1) amount ,t7.package_name secondname ,case when (cp.home_tel like '%-%' or cp.home_tel is null) then cp.linkman_tel else cp.home_tel end phone ,case when （t3.package_name like '%顺产%' or t3.package_name like '%剖宫产%' or t3.package_name like '%基础包%'） and t3.package_name not like '%自选包%' and t3.package_name not like '%无痛%' and t3.package_name not like '%赠送%' then replace(t4.name,'套餐','') else replace(t4.name,'套餐','')||'加收' end firstname ,cp.channel1 ,cp.channel2 ,case when t.print_invoiceno like 'IB%' then '广州爱博恩妇产医院' else '爱博恩医疗门诊部' end hospitalname ,t2.card_no ,t8.invoice_no i from exp_packageinvoice t left join exp_package t2 on t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and t.trans_type=t2.trans_type left join (select ep.* from exp_packagedetail epd ,exp_package ep,bd_com_package bp where epd.clinic_code=ep.clinic_code and epd.trans_type=ep.trans_type and ep.package_id=bp.package_id and epd.item_name like '%脐带血造血干细胞储存费%' ) t8 on t2.clinic_code=t8.clinic_code and t2.trans_type=t8.trans_type and t2.invoice_no=t8.invoice_no and t2.package_id=t8.package_id left join bd_com_package t3 on t2.package_id = t3.package_id left join bd_com_package t7 on t3.parent_code=t7.package_id left join com_patientinfo cp on t2.card_no=cp.card_no left join (select * from com_dictionary where type = 'PACKAGETYPE') t4 on t3.package_kind = t4.code where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and t4.code!='21' and t4.code in ('1','3') )t left join ( select ep.card_no,min(ep.oper_date) oper_date3,sum(decode(ep.trans_type,1,1,2,-1)) amount,type from ( select distinct ep.card_no,to_char(ep.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date,ep.trans_type,ep.invoice_no ,replace(cd.name,'套餐','') type from exp_package ep left join bd_com_package bp on ep.package_id=bp.package_id left join com_dictionary cd on bp.package_kind=cd.code and cd.type='PACKAGETYPE' where ep.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and cd.code in ('1','3') and ep.pay_flag=1 and （bp.package_name like '%顺产%' or bp.package_name like '%剖宫产%' or bp.package_name like '%基础包%'） and bp.package_name not like '%自选包%' and bp.package_name not like '%无痛%' and bp.package_name not like '%赠送%')ep group by ep.card_no,type ) ep3 on t.card_no=ep3.card_no and ep3.type=t.firstname group by hospitalname,name,phone,firstname,oper_date, channel1,channel2 ,case when firstname not like '%加收%' and oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount>0 then 1 when firstname not like '%加收%' and oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount<0 then -1 else 0 end union all select hospitalname, name patientname, phone phone, firstname, wm_concat(distinct secondname) secondname, wm_concat(distinct packagename) packagename, case when ep3.amount>0 and ep3.oper_date=tt.oper_date then 1 when ep3.amount<0 and ep3.oper_date=tt.oper_date then -1 else 0 end amount, round(sum(case when invoice_real = 0 then 0 else round(cashCost*real_cost/invoice_real,4) end),2) cashCost, tt.oper_date oper_date, channel1, channel2 from ( select replace(t4.name,'套餐','') firstname, ---产检 t3.package_name packagename, t.invoice_no invoice_no, t.real_cost invoice_real, t2.real_cost, cp.name, to_char(t2.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date, nvl((select sum(a.real_cost) from exp_packagepaymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and (a.mode_code in ( 'CA','UP','ZB','WP','PO','CD')) ),0) cashCost ,decode(t2.trans_type,1,1,2,'-1') amount ,t7.package_name secondname ,case when (cp.home_tel like '%-%' or cp.home_tel is null) then cp.linkman_tel else cp.home_tel end phone ,cp.channel1 ,cp.channel2 ,case when t.print_invoiceno like 'IB%' then '广州爱博恩妇产医院' else '爱博恩医疗门诊部' end hospitalname ,t2.card_no from exp_packageinvoice t left join exp_package t2 on t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and t.trans_type=t2.trans_type left join bd_com_package t3 on t2.package_id = t3.package_id left join bd_com_package t7 on t3.parent_code=t7.package_id left join com_patientinfo cp on t2.card_no=cp.card_no left join (select * from com_dictionary where type = 'PACKAGETYPE') t4 on t3.package_kind = t4.code where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and t4.code!='21' and t4.code in ('4') and t.trans_type = t2.trans_type )tt left join ( select ep.card_no,min(ep.oper_date) oper_date,sum(decode(ep.trans_type,1,1,2,-1)) amount,type from ( select distinct ep.card_no,ep.trans_type,to_char(ep.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date,ep.invoice_no,replace(cd.name,'套餐','') type from exp_package ep left join bd_com_package bp on ep.package_id=bp.package_id left join com_dictionary cd on bp.package_kind=cd.code and cd.type='PACKAGETYPE' where ep.delimiting_date between to_date(to_char(to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') - interval '10' month,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and cd.code in ('4') and ep.pay_flag=1 )ep group by ep.card_no,type ) ep3 on tt.card_no=ep3.card_no group by hospitalname,name,phone,firstname,tt.oper_date, channel1,channel2 ,case when ep3.amount>0 and ep3.oper_date=tt.oper_date then 1 when ep3.amount<0 and ep3.oper_date=tt.oper_date then -1 else 0 end union all select HOSPITALNAME, PATIENTNAME, PHONE, FIRSTNAME, SECONDNAME, PACKAGENAME, case when CASHCOST>1000 then 1 when CASHCOST<=1000 and t2.amount =0 then 0 when CASHCOST<=1000 and t2.amount =1 then 0 when t2.amount <0 then -1 else 0 end AMOUNT, CASHCOST, ttt.OPER_DATE, CHANNEL1, CHANNEL2 from ( select hospitalname, name patientname, phone phone, firstname, wm_concat(distinct secondname) secondname, wm_concat(distinct packagename) packagename, sum(amount)amount, round(sum(case when invoice_real = 0 then 0 else round(cashCost*real_cost/invoice_real,4) end),2) cashCost, oper_date oper_date, channel1, channel2, card_no from ( select case when t4.name like '%综%' then '综' else replace(t4.name,'套餐','') end firstname, --儿保、综合门诊 t3.package_name packagename, t.invoice_no invoice_no, t.real_cost invoice_real, t2.real_cost, cp.name, to_char(t2.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date, nvl((select sum(a.real_cost) from exp_packagepaymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and (a.mode_code in ( 'CA','UP','ZB','WP','PO','CD')) ),0) cashCost ,case when t3.package_name like '%自选包%' then 0 when t3.package_name not like '%自选包%' and t2.trans_type=1 then 1 when t3.package_name not like '%自选包%' and t2.trans_type=1 then -1 end amount ,t7.package_name secondname ,case when (cp.home_tel like '%-%' or cp.home_tel is null) then cp.linkman_tel else cp.home_tel end phone , case when t3.package_name like '%自选包%' then '自选包' else '套餐' end type ,cp.channel1 ,cp.channel2 ,case when t.print_invoiceno like 'IB%' then '广州爱博恩妇产医院' else '爱博恩医疗门诊部' end hospitalname ,t2.card_no from exp_packageinvoice t left join exp_package t2 on t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and t.trans_type=t2.trans_type left join bd_com_package t3 on t2.package_id = t3.package_id left join bd_com_package t7 on t3.parent_code=t7.package_id left join com_patientinfo cp on t2.card_no=cp.card_no left join (select * from com_dictionary where type = 'PACKAGETYPE') t4 on t3.package_kind = t4.code where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and t4.code!='21' and t4.code in ('2','7','8','9','10','22','23','24') and t.trans_type = t2.trans_type )tt group by hospitalname,name,phone,firstname,oper_date, channel1,channel2,card_no)ttt left join ( select t2.card_no,t2.oper_date,sum(amount) amount from ( select distinct ep.card_no,to_char(ep.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date,decode(ep.trans_type,1,1,2,-1)amount,ep.invoice_no ,case when cd.name like '%综%' then '综' else replace(cd.name,'套餐','') end type from exp_package ep left join bd_com_package bp on ep.package_id=bp.package_id left join com_dictionary cd on bp.package_kind=cd.code and cd.type='PACKAGETYPE' where ep.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and cd.code in ('2','7','8','9','10','22','23','24') and ep.pay_flag=1 )t2 group by t2.card_no,t2.oper_date )t2 on ttt.card_no=t2.card_no and t2.oper_date=ttt.oper_date )t1 group by HOSPITALNAME, PATIENTNAME, PHONE, FIRSTNAME, OPER_DATE, CHANNEL1, CHANNEL2 )tt where firstname not like '%加收%' group by channel1,channel2,firstname union all select nvl(sum(AMOUNT),0) 人次, '合计' 来源, firstname 科室 from ( select HOSPITALNAME, PATIENTNAME, PHONE, FIRSTNAME, wm_concat(distinct SECONDNAME) SECONDNAME, wm_concat(distinct PACKAGENAME) PACKAGENAME, sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT, sum(CASHCOST) CASHCOST, OPER_DATE, CHANNEL1, CHANNEL2 from ( select hospitalname, name patientname, phone phone, firstname, wm_concat(distinct secondname) secondname, wm_concat(distinct packagename) packagename, case when oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount3>0 then 1 when oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount3<0 then -1 else 0 end amount, round(sum(case when invoice_real = 0 then 0 else round(cashCost*real_cost/invoice_real,4) end),2) cashCost, oper_date oper_date, channel1, channel2 from ( --妇科、生活美容、LPG、中医科、其他 select case when t4.code in ('11','14','5','19') then '妇科' else replace(t4.name,'套餐','') end firstname, t3.package_name packagename, t.invoice_no invoice_no, t.real_cost invoice_real, t2.real_cost, cp.name, to_char(t2.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date, nvl((select sum(a.real_cost) from exp_packagepaymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and (a.mode_code in ( 'CA','UP','ZB','WP','PO','CD')) ),0) cashCost， case when t3.package_name like '%自选包%' then 0 when t3.package_name not like '%自选包%' and t2.trans_type=1 then 1 when t3.package_name not like '%自选包%' and t2.trans_type=2 then -1 end amount ,t7.package_name secondname ,case when (cp.home_tel like '%-%' or cp.home_tel is null) then cp.linkman_tel else cp.home_tel end phone , case when t3.package_name like '%自选包%' then '自选包' else '套餐' end type ,cp.channel1 ,cp.channel2 ,case when t.print_invoiceno like 'IB%' then '广州爱博恩妇产医院' else '爱博恩医疗门诊部' end hospitalname ,t2.card_no from exp_packageinvoice t left join exp_package t2 on t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and t.trans_type=t2.trans_type left join bd_com_package t3 on t2.package_id = t3.package_id left join bd_com_package t7 on t3.parent_code=t7.package_id left join com_patientinfo cp on t2.card_no=cp.card_no left join (select * from com_dictionary where type = 'PACKAGETYPE') t4 on t3.package_kind = t4.code where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and t4.code!='21' and t4.code in ('12','14','11','17','13', '19','5','20'，'16') and t.trans_type = t2.trans_type union all---医美 select case when t4.code='15' then '居家月子' else '医美' end firstname, t3.package_name packagename, t.invoice_no invoice_no, t.real_cost invoice_real, t2.real_cost, cp.name, to_char(t2.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date, nvl((select sum(a.real_cost) from exp_packagepaymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and (a.mode_code in ( 'CA','UP','ZB','WP','PO','CD')) ),0) cashCost ,decode(t2.trans_type,1,1,2,-1) amount ,t7.package_name secondname ,case when cp.home_tel like '%-%' or cp.home_tel is null then cp.linkman_tel else cp.home_tel end phone ,case when t3.package_name like '%自选包%' then '自选包' else '套餐' end type ,cp.channel1 ,cp.channel2 ,case when t.print_invoiceno like 'IB%' then '广州爱博恩妇产医院' else '爱博恩医疗门诊部' end hospitalname ,t2.card_no from exp_packageinvoice t left join exp_package t2 on t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and t.trans_type=t2.trans_type left join bd_com_package t3 on t2.package_id = t3.package_id left join bd_com_package t7 on t3.parent_code=t7.package_id left join com_patientinfo cp on t2.card_no=cp.card_no left join (select * from com_dictionary where type = 'PACKAGETYPE') t4 on t3.package_kind = t4.code where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and t4.code!='21' and t4.code in ('25'，'6','15') and t.trans_type = t2.trans_type )tt left join (select ep.card_no,min(ep.oper_date) oper_date3,sum(decode(ep.trans_type,1,1,2,-1)) amount3,type from ( select distinct ep.card_no,to_char(ep.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date,ep.trans_type,ep.invoice_no ,case when cd.code in ('11','14','5','19') then '妇科' when cd.code in ('25','6') then '医美' else replace(cd.name,'套餐','') end type from exp_package ep left join bd_com_package bp on ep.package_id=bp.package_id left join com_dictionary cd on bp.package_kind=cd.code and cd.type='PACKAGETYPE' where ep.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and cd.code in ('25','6','12','14','11','17','13', '19','5','20'，'16','15') and ep.pay_flag=1 )ep group by ep.card_no,type ) ep3 on tt.card_no=ep3.card_no and ep3.type=tt.firstname group by hospitalname,name,phone,firstname,oper_date, channel1,channel2 ,case when oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount3>0 then 1 when oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount3<0 then -1 else 0 end union all select hospitalname, name patientname, phone phone, firstname, wm_concat(distinct secondname) secondname, wm_concat(distinct packagename) packagename, case when firstname not like '%加收%' and oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount>0 then 1 when firstname not like '%加收%' and oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount<0 then -1 else 0 end amount, round(sum(case when (invoice_real = 0 or i is not null) then 0 else round(cashCost*real_cost/invoice_real,4) end),2) cashCost, oper_date, channel1, channel2 from ( select --replace(t4.name,'套餐','') firstname, --分娩、月子 t3.package_name packagename, t.invoice_no invoice_no, t.real_cost invoice_real, t2.real_cost, cp.name, to_char(t2.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date, nvl((select sum(a.real_cost) from exp_packagepaymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and (a.mode_code in ( 'CA','UP','ZB','WP','PO','CD')) ),0) cashCost ,decode(t2.trans_type,1,1,2,-1) amount ,t7.package_name secondname ,case when (cp.home_tel like '%-%' or cp.home_tel is null) then cp.linkman_tel else cp.home_tel end phone ,case when （t3.package_name like '%顺产%' or t3.package_name like '%剖宫产%' or t3.package_name like '%基础包%'） and t3.package_name not like '%自选包%' and t3.package_name not like '%无痛%' and t3.package_name not like '%赠送%' then replace(t4.name,'套餐','') else replace(t4.name,'套餐','')||'加收' end firstname ,cp.channel1 ,cp.channel2 ,case when t.print_invoiceno like 'IB%' then '广州爱博恩妇产医院' else '爱博恩医疗门诊部' end hospitalname ,t2.card_no ,t8.invoice_no i from exp_packageinvoice t left join exp_package t2 on t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and t.trans_type=t2.trans_type left join (select ep.* from exp_packagedetail epd ,exp_package ep,bd_com_package bp where epd.clinic_code=ep.clinic_code and epd.trans_type=ep.trans_type and ep.package_id=bp.package_id and epd.item_name like '%脐带血造血干细胞储存费%' ) t8 on t2.clinic_code=t8.clinic_code and t2.trans_type=t8.trans_type and t2.invoice_no=t8.invoice_no and t2.package_id=t8.package_id left join bd_com_package t3 on t2.package_id = t3.package_id left join bd_com_package t7 on t3.parent_code=t7.package_id left join com_patientinfo cp on t2.card_no=cp.card_no left join (select * from com_dictionary where type = 'PACKAGETYPE') t4 on t3.package_kind = t4.code where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and t4.code!='21' and t4.code in ('1','3') )t left join ( select ep.card_no,min(ep.oper_date) oper_date3,sum(decode(ep.trans_type,1,1,2,-1)) amount,type from ( select distinct ep.card_no,to_char(ep.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date,ep.trans_type,ep.invoice_no ,replace(cd.name,'套餐','') type from exp_package ep left join bd_com_package bp on ep.package_id=bp.package_id left join com_dictionary cd on bp.package_kind=cd.code and cd.type='PACKAGETYPE' where ep.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and cd.code in ('1','3') and ep.pay_flag=1 and （bp.package_name like '%顺产%' or bp.package_name like '%剖宫产%' or bp.package_name like '%基础包%'） and bp.package_name not like '%自选包%' and bp.package_name not like '%无痛%' and bp.package_name not like '%赠送%')ep group by ep.card_no,type ) ep3 on t.card_no=ep3.card_no and ep3.type=t.firstname group by hospitalname,name,phone,firstname,oper_date, channel1,channel2 ,case when firstname not like '%加收%' and oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount>0 then 1 when firstname not like '%加收%' and oper_date=ep3.oper_date3 and ep3.amount<0 then -1 else 0 end union all select hospitalname, name patientname, phone phone, firstname, wm_concat(distinct secondname) secondname, wm_concat(distinct packagename) packagename, case when ep3.amount>0 and ep3.oper_date=tt.oper_date then 1 when ep3.amount<0 and ep3.oper_date=tt.oper_date then -1 else 0 end amount, round(sum(case when invoice_real = 0 then 0 else round(cashCost*real_cost/invoice_real,4) end),2) cashCost, tt.oper_date oper_date, channel1, channel2 from ( select replace(t4.name,'套餐','') firstname, ---产检 t3.package_name packagename, t.invoice_no invoice_no, t.real_cost invoice_real, t2.real_cost, cp.name, to_char(t2.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date, nvl((select sum(a.real_cost) from exp_packagepaymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and (a.mode_code in ( 'CA','UP','ZB','WP','PO','CD')) ),0) cashCost ,decode(t2.trans_type,1,1,2,'-1') amount ,t7.package_name secondname ,case when (cp.home_tel like '%-%' or cp.home_tel is null) then cp.linkman_tel else cp.home_tel end phone ,cp.channel1 ,cp.channel2 ,case when t.print_invoiceno like 'IB%' then '广州爱博恩妇产医院' else '爱博恩医疗门诊部' end hospitalname ,t2.card_no from exp_packageinvoice t left join exp_package t2 on t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and t.trans_type=t2.trans_type left join bd_com_package t3 on t2.package_id = t3.package_id left join bd_com_package t7 on t3.parent_code=t7.package_id left join com_patientinfo cp on t2.card_no=cp.card_no left join (select * from com_dictionary where type = 'PACKAGETYPE') t4 on t3.package_kind = t4.code where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and t4.code!='21' and t4.code in ('4') and t.trans_type = t2.trans_type )tt left join ( select ep.card_no,min(ep.oper_date) oper_date,sum(decode(ep.trans_type,1,1,2,-1)) amount,type from ( select distinct ep.card_no,ep.trans_type,to_char(ep.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date,ep.invoice_no,replace(cd.name,'套餐','') type from exp_package ep left join bd_com_package bp on ep.package_id=bp.package_id left join com_dictionary cd on bp.package_kind=cd.code and cd.type='PACKAGETYPE' where ep.delimiting_date between to_date(to_char(to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') - interval '10' month,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and cd.code in ('4') and ep.pay_flag=1 )ep group by ep.card_no,type ) ep3 on tt.card_no=ep3.card_no group by hospitalname,name,phone,firstname,tt.oper_date, channel1,channel2 ,case when ep3.amount>0 and ep3.oper_date=tt.oper_date then 1 when ep3.amount<0 and ep3.oper_date=tt.oper_date then -1 else 0 end union all select HOSPITALNAME, PATIENTNAME, PHONE, FIRSTNAME, SECONDNAME, PACKAGENAME, case when CASHCOST>1000 then 1 when CASHCOST<=1000 and t2.amount =0 then 0 when CASHCOST<=1000 and t2.amount =1 then 0 when t2.amount <0 then -1 else 0 end AMOUNT, CASHCOST, ttt.OPER_DATE, CHANNEL1, CHANNEL2 from ( select hospitalname, name patientname, phone phone, firstname, wm_concat(distinct secondname) secondname, wm_concat(distinct packagename) packagename, sum(amount)amount, round(sum(case when invoice_real = 0 then 0 else round(cashCost*real_cost/invoice_real,4) end),2) cashCost, oper_date oper_date, channel1, channel2, card_no from ( select case when t4.name like '%综%' then '综' else replace(t4.name,'套餐','') end firstname, --儿保、综合门诊 t3.package_name packagename, t.invoice_no invoice_no, t.real_cost invoice_real, t2.real_cost, cp.name, to_char(t2.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date, nvl((select sum(a.real_cost) from exp_packagepaymode a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and (a.mode_code in ( 'CA','UP','ZB','WP','PO','CD')) ),0) cashCost ,case when t3.package_name like '%自选包%' then 0 when t3.package_name not like '%自选包%' and t2.trans_type=1 then 1 when t3.package_name not like '%自选包%' and t2.trans_type=1 then -1 end amount ,t7.package_name secondname ,case when (cp.home_tel like '%-%' or cp.home_tel is null) then cp.linkman_tel else cp.home_tel end phone , case when t3.package_name like '%自选包%' then '自选包' else '套餐' end type ,cp.channel1 ,cp.channel2 ,case when t.print_invoiceno like 'IB%' then '广州爱博恩妇产医院' else '爱博恩医疗门诊部' end hospitalname ,t2.card_no from exp_packageinvoice t left join exp_package t2 on t.invoice_no = t2.invoice_no and t.trans_type=t2.trans_type left join bd_com_package t3 on t2.package_id = t3.package_id left join bd_com_package t7 on t3.parent_code=t7.package_id left join com_patientinfo cp on t2.card_no=cp.card_no left join (select * from com_dictionary where type = 'PACKAGETYPE') t4 on t3.package_kind = t4.code where t.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and t4.code!='21' and t4.code in ('2','7','8','9','10','22','23','24') and t.trans_type = t2.trans_type )tt group by hospitalname,name,phone,firstname,oper_date, channel1,channel2,card_no)ttt left join ( select t2.card_no,t2.oper_date,sum(amount) amount from ( select distinct ep.card_no,to_char(ep.oper_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') oper_date,decode(ep.trans_type,1,1,2,-1)amount,ep.invoice_no ,case when cd.name like '%综%' then '综' else replace(cd.name,'套餐','') end type from exp_package ep left join bd_com_package bp on ep.package_id=bp.package_id left join com_dictionary cd on bp.package_kind=cd.code and cd.type='PACKAGETYPE' where ep.oper_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+0.99 and cd.code in ('2','7','8','9','10','22','23','24') and ep.pay_flag=1 )t2 group by t2.card_no,t2.oper_date )t2 on ttt.card_no=t2.card_no and t2.oper_date=ttt.oper_date )t1 group by HOSPITALNAME, PATIENTNAME, PHONE, FIRSTNAME, OPER_DATE, CHANNEL1, CHANNEL2 )tt where firstname not like '%加收%' group by channel1,channel2,firstname
) t3 pivot (sum（人次） for 来源 in('市场转诊-中山三院' 中山三院,'市场转诊-外院' 外院，'市场转诊-企业会员' 企业会员,'市场转诊-商业保险' 商业保险,'市场转诊-异业联盟'异业联盟 ,'渠道转诊-企业' 企业 ,'渠道转诊-其他' 渠道转诊其他,'渠道转诊-个人'个人 ,'品牌效应-口碑' 口碑 ,'品牌效应-活动' 活动,'品牌效应-户外'户外,'品牌效应-其他广告' 其他广告,'品牌效应-纸媒'纸媒 ,'网络媒体-官网'官网,'网络媒体-微信'官微,'网络媒体-挂号网' 挂号网,'网络媒体-社群'社群,'网络媒体-商城'商城,'网络媒体-其它网络'其它网络 ,'介绍-代理人' 代理人,'介绍-老带新'老带新,'介绍-员工推介'员工推介,'介绍-员工本人'本院员工,'介绍-其它' 其它,'公海渠道-公海渠道' 公海渠道,'其他' 其他,'-' 其,'合计' 合计)) ) group by rollup((科室))
